categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: The Rescue on Arkinnea took place several months after the creation of the Galactic Empire. The Whiphid Jedi Master K'Kruhk, after crash landing on Arkinnea from an attack on a jungle moon, protected his students from the Galactic Empire, more specifically the Arkinnea Militia, and established a Hidden Temple on the planet with the aid of Captain Denimoor and Commander Teron, who did not believe Emperor Palpatine's claims that the Jedi Order had turned traitor against the Galactic Republic.
